## Exercises

Throughout the sessions we will be working with prepared shiny apps.

To follow along and complete the exercises, you should download the apps from the drop-down in the top right, or simply run:

```r
usethis::use_course("https://workshop.nectric.com.au/shiny-wombat24/apps.zip")
```
